title: Typographic Anachronisms
content:
Macy’s Christmas windows this year are a loving recreation, in miniature, of Miracle on 34th Street. The font... Comic Sans! WTF?

 [‹ 21st Century Design Movements?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081208085240/http:/typophile.com/node/51794 "Go to previous forum topic") [Types of The Enlightenment? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081208085240/http:/typophile.com/node/52384 "Go to next forum topic")
author: pattyfab

comments.content:
